verses.text:
Thou shalt not sacrifice unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God \add any\add* bullock , or sheep , wherein is blemish , \add or\add* any evilfavouredness : for that \add is\add* an abomination unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God.  +  r 17.1  t sheep: or, goat * \p

¶ If there be found among you, within any of thy gates which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God giveth thee, man or woman , that hath wrought wickedness in the sight of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God , in transgressing his covenant ,
And hath gone and served other gods , and worshipped them, either the sun , or moon , or any of the host of heaven , which I have not commanded ;

And it be told thee, and thou hast heard \add of it\add*, and enquired diligently , and, behold, \add it be\add* true , \add and\add* the thing certain , \add that\add* such abomination is wrought in Israel :

Then shalt thou bring forth that man or that woman , which have committed that wicked thing , unto thy gates , \add even\add* that man or that woman , and shalt stone them with stones , till they die.
At the mouth of two witnesses , or three witnesses , shall he that is worthy of death be put to death ; \add but\add* at the mouth of one witness he shall not be put to death.
The hands of the witnesses shall be first upon him to put him to death , and afterward the hands of all the people. So thou shalt put the evil away from among you. \p

¶ If there arise a matter too hard for thee in judgment , between blood and blood , between plea and plea , and between stroke and stroke , \add being\add* matters of controversy within thy gates : then shalt thou arise , and get thee up into the place which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God shall choose ;
And thou shalt come unto the priests the Levites , and unto the judge that shall be in those days , and enquire ; and they shall shew thee the sentence of judgment :

And thou shalt do according to the sentence , which they of that place which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall choose shall shew thee; and thou shalt observe to do according to all that they inform thee:

According to the sentence of the law which they shall teach thee, and according to the judgment which they shall tell thee, thou shalt do : thou shalt not decline from the sentence which they shall shew thee, \add to\add* the right hand , nor \add to\add* the left.

And the man that will do presumptuously , and will not hearken unto the priest that standeth to minister there before the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God , or unto the judge , even that man shall die : and thou shalt put away the evil from Israel.\f + \fr 17.12 \ft and will…: Heb. not to hearken\f*
And all the people shall hear , and fear , and do no more presumptuously. \p

¶ When thou art come unto the land which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God giveth thee, and shalt possess it, and shalt dwell therein, and shalt say , I will set a king over me, like as all the nations that \add are\add* about me;

Thou shalt in any wise set \add him\add* king over thee, whom the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God shall choose : \add one\add* from among thy brethren shalt thou set king over thee: thou mayest not set a stranger over thee, which \add is\add* not thy brother.

But he shall not multiply horses to himself, nor cause the people to return to Egypt , to the end that he should multiply horses : forasmuch as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath said unto you, Ye shall henceforth return no more that way.
Neither shall he multiply wives to himself, that his heart turn not away: neither shall he greatly multiply to himself silver and gold.
And it shall be, when he sitteth upon the throne of his kingdom , that he shall write him a copy of this law in a book out of \add that which is\add* before the priests the Levites :

And it shall be with him, and he shall read therein all the days of his life : that he may learn to fear the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* his God , to keep all the words of this law and these statutes , to do them:

That his heart be not lifted up above his brethren , and that he turn not aside from the commandment , \add to\add* the right hand , or \add to\add* the left : to the end that he may prolong \add his\add* days in his kingdom , he, and his children , in the midst of Israel.
